hits.title: Introducing React Hooks
hits.snippet: Hooks let you use state and other React features without writing a class. useState, useEffect, useContext, and more.

hits.title: useEffect - Complete Guide
hits.snippet: Deep dive into useEffect, the most powerful and misunderstood React hook. Learn cleanup, dependencies, and common pitfalls.

hits.title: Building Custom Hooks in React
hits.snippet: Extract reusable logic into custom hooks. Share stateful behavior between components without changing hierarchy.

hits.title: React Hooks Cheat Sheet
hits.snippet: Quick reference for all built-in React hooks including useState, useReducer, useMemo, useCallback, useRef, and useId.

hits.title: Rules of Hooks - React Documentation
hits.snippet: Only call hooks at the top level. Only call hooks from React functions. These rules ensure hooks work correctly every render.
